Summary: Very large size of 3-6 empier state buildings...
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on a brake at work , i was with a co worker having a smoke when i was looking up at the sky , it was a clear day when i noticed a very larg object , as soon as i seen this my mind started to try to identify this by comparison to convencinal air craft to no conclusion the size and shape made no sence , this is when i made a coment to my co worker "whats that" , he looked and wasnt realy as shocked as i was more or less might have thought was a pice of space shuttle dibree ,or a satilite.. as larg as this was it couldnt be. Here is a discription , Cylinder shaped , it looked as if it was made of something shiny like mirror or crome...was horizontile , and did not move.. It looked like a enormose cigarette . It stayed there , i had to go back to work so that was it.. I wish i had been able to get a picture... This is the first thing ive ever seen...
